description: Number of steps to fixed point of "n -> n/2 or (n-1)/2 until result is prime".
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: nerlist[ n_Integer ] := Length/@Drop[ FixedPointList[ If[ EvenQ[ # ]&&#>2, #/ 2, If[ PrimeQ[ # ]||(#===1), #, (#-1)/2 ] ]&, n, 20 ], -1 ]
prog: (Haskell)a039636 1 = 1a039636 n = snd $ until ((== 1) . a010051 . fst)                        (\(x, i) -> (x `div` 2 , i + 1)) (n, 1)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 17 2013
author: _Wouter Meeussen_
